ignitionSources.description: Are ignition sources adequately managed and controlled in the premises to reduce the risk of fire?

adequateMeasures.description: Are adequate measures in place to control the spread of a potential fire in the premises?

personsEvacuate.description: Can persons evacuate the premises safely in the event of a fire emergency in the premises?

escapeRoutes.description: Can persons use the escape routes and final exits safely?

adequateEquipment.description: Is there adequate equipment in the premises for extinguishing small fires?

adequateArrangements.description: Are adequate arrangements in place to detect fires and raise the alarm to those people on the premises?

adequateInstructions.description: Are adequate instructions or guidance on procedures to follow in an emergency provided for employees?

adequateManagement.description: Are adequate management procedures in place to mitigate the effects of fires in the premises?

sufficientPrecautions.description: Are sufficient precautions in place to safeguard the safety of relevant persons in case of fire?
